summary: REQ-1 is partially addressed via new menu-specific CSS tokens/classes and usage of a `menu-surface` class on at least one dropdown menu. However, the diff evidence is truncated and does not clearly show the same treatment applied to all required desktop dropdowns and the mobile slide-over (SheetContent). Additionally, several unrelated styling/product changes appear to have been introduced, which violates the request to keep changes limited to menu styling/readability and avoid broader theme/site changes or new routes/navigation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Desktop dropdown menus (Customer, Sellers & Businesses, Legal, and authenticated user menu) render on a white or very light blue background and the menu item text is clearly readable.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet shows `DropdownMenuContent` for the Customer dropdown using `className="w-48 menu-surface"`, but the file is truncated before showing Sellers & Businesses, Legal, and the authenticated user menu dropdown content classes. Cannot confirm they were updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Mobile menu (SheetContent) renders on a white or very light blue background and all listed links/sections are clearly readable.
missing_requirements.reason: `SheetContent` is imported, and menu styling classes are defined in CSS, but the truncated Layout diff does not show `SheetContent` being given `menu-surface` (or equivalent) classes. Cannot confirm the mobile slide-over background/readability changes were applied.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hover/focus states maintain strong contrast and do not reduce readability across desktop and mobile menus.
missing_requirements.reason: CSS defines `.menu-item` hover/focus background, but the truncated diff does not show `DropdownMenuItem` (and mobile links) actually using the `.menu-item` / `.menu-link` classes throughout. Cannot confirm the hover/focus behavior is applied to all menu items.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/background changes beyond menu styling (forcing light color scheme and setting `body { background: white; }`).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals/constraints request keeping changes limited to menu styling/readability and not changing non-menu page backgrounds; this change affects the entire app background and theme behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Animated gradient logo text styling (`.logo-text` with gradient animation).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 and not limited to menu readability; it changes broader header branding styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Promotional banner added/modified in header with emoji and close button behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of menu background/readability requirements and constitutes additional header UI behavior outside requested scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction/mention of new routes and pages like `/admin` and `/portal`, profile setup modal, dashboard pages, payment success/failure flows, etc.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit constraint: do not introduce new navigation items or routes; the modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` describes new routes/features unrelated to menu styling.
